name: Spot Health
headline: At-home diagnostics as a service
description: Spot is building the infrastructure to support the future of at-home diagnostics. Our fully white-labeled platform helps brands offer lab-analyzed diagnostic tests using at-home collection kits. Companies simply order tests via our API, and we handle the rest—the collection kits, the logistics, physician authorization, and the lab integrations.

[Book a call](https://spotdx.com/</meet>)
# Home Testing for Health Brands
Everything you need to offer your users lab-analyzed blood, urine, and saliva tests with at-home sample collection. 
[Get Started](https://spotdx.com/</meet>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f664e79f3a306a4de9ca5d_screenshot.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63fa3febf86571950cfb94cb_ZbzCRg7_iphone13blue_portrait.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/641229ac8d81bf04577f998f_640521270d34776f5f3eaa84_image-removebg%20\(1\).png)
## At-home testing is the future
At-home testing is fast, convenient, and more efficient than in-person lab visits. This is the future of diagnostics.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad986f9ea90f_check%20orange.svg)
###### HIPAA compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad986f9ea90f_check%20orange.svg)
###### End-to-end logistics and lab integrations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad986f9ea90f_check%20orange.svg)
###### Launch in days, not months
## Your users,your brand
Launch with packaging and digital tools that match the brand your users already know and love.
[Find out more](https://spotdx.com/</meet>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/64051f7fa05a6b216366908c_qGLCJbo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/64051f23a2b6535dd16c5b6e_uKzFG6C.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f6eac72b43276a865a0176_ae7efc4b-01a4-42ab-8360-c28995d111f4.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)
## Our Process
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad0ffd9ea8fa_icon%204.svg)
#### **Order kits**
We send an at-home collection kit to your user. Some states require a doctor’s order. We handle this for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad901d9ea90a_arrow%201.svg)
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad49389ea905_icon%206.svg)
#### **User collects a sample**
After collecting a sample, your user sends it to one of our partner labs using the provided prepaid mailer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad23cd9ea90b_arrow%202.svg)
3
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad84899ea8fc_icon%201.svg)
#### **Get results**
We make it easy to integrate results into your customer-facing app. We provide results, normal ranges, and medically-vetted interpretations.
[Get Started](https://spotdx.com/</meet>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad6f0f9ea8f9_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/643a90da6abe3e5feaa6dc83_carbon%20\(7\).png)
## A turnkey solution for home testing
Launching a testing operation is hard, but it doesn't need to be. Focus on what you do best, let us handle the rest.
[Read the docs](https://spotdx.com/<https:/docs.spotdx.com>)
## Spot powers the brands transforming remote care
Whatever your connection to diagnostics, Spot is here to help you launch faster and better.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad986f9ea90f_check%20orange.svg)
##### Personalize Products
Tailor to a user's specific needs and track their progress - supplements, fitness programs, meal plans, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad62759ea902_icon%20mail.svg)
##### Improve Patient Experience
Stop sending users to draw sites. Monitor chronic conditions and screen for cancers, STIs and more at home.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad063e9ea8fd_icon%207.svg)
##### Demonstrate Efficacy
Promote your product with evidence-based claims. We help you run efficacy studies at a fraction of the cost.
## Learn how home testing adds value to your brand
Let's work together to change the future of patient care.
[Get in touch](https://spotdx.com/</sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f6987b511a408ac7c42e4e_demonstrate-progress-04a8c44d7933cb3debf659886414585a.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f64e9e98bfad2cb99ea8f8_orange%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63f64e9e98bfad11719ea8d4/63f6e4ccc40da5e5bc80fb85_download.svg)

generated_description:
Spot Health is at the forefront of revolutionizing the healthcare landscape, specifically through at-home diagnostics. Founded in 2021 and a participant in Y Combinator Batch W22, this Cincinnati-based startup is built around a straightforward yet powerful mission: providing diagnostics as a service directly to consumers, enabling them to take control of their health from the comfort of their homes.

Their white-labeled platform allows brands to offer comprehensive lab-analyzed diagnostic tests, covering blood, urine, and saliva samples collected at home. This approach not only makes healthcare more accessible but also eliminates the hassle of in-person lab visits. By simply integrating Spot Health’s API, companies can order collection kits and rely on Spot to manage everything—from the logistics to obtaining physician approvals and laboratory partnerships. 

With a compact team of nine passionate employees, Spot Health aims to streamline the testing process and enhance user experience. Their service is HIPAA compliant, guaranteeing user privacy while ensuring efficient handling of test kits and results. The ultimate goal? To help brands launch their testing operations quickly— days rather than months—while offering robust, personalized health solutions.

Spot Health is positioned at the intersection of telehealth and diagnostics, tapping into a growing market of consumers seeking convenient, reliable health data at home. With a focus on personalization and patient empowerment, they are reshaping how we think about diagnostic testing and care.

If you’re intrigued about how Spot Health could elevate your brand’s health offerings, head over to their website [Spot Health](https://spotdx.com), where you can explore their services further or even book a call. With Spot Health, the future of diagnostics is not just envisioned; it’s being actively created.
